title: Add Telegram progress indicators
description: Send immediate 'got it' confirmation when message received, then meaningful status updates while working on longer tasks. This improves UX by keeping Dave informed instead of waiting in the dark.

actions.note: Requested by Dave via Telegram after successful wake-on-message test
Started work - approach: typing indicator via hooks, progress messages stay personal
Implemented: gateway sends typing indicator on message receipt, telegram-send.sh utility for progress messages. Dave confirmed working.
